title: About MalwaCoco
content: MalwaCoco is here to supply high-quality coconuts from Southeast Sulawesi. We are committed to supporting the food, cosmetics, and renewable energy industries with the best coconut products direct from local farmers. This website is built with Astro and Tailwind CSS for top performance and clean design.

list.item: Product photos and illustrations are from MalwaCoco’s production collection and trusted sources.
Some icon elements are from icones.js.org by @antfu.
Sliders and galleries are powered by SwiperJS.
Inter font is used under license from rsms.me.
Website design and development by MalwaCoco’s in-house team, inspired to support local farmers.
